text: Bertin Tokéné (born 10 May 1975 in Douala, Cameroon) is a Cameroonian-Belgian football defender. He currently plays for R.J.S. Heppignies-Lambusart-Fleurus. ==External links== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Cameroonian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Belgian people of Cameroonian descent Category:R. title: Bertin Tokéné
